description: This is a community I don't have enough words to appreciate, WebXDao has really supportive members who helped me build my first DAPP, they also gave me a chance to participate with their founders in hackathons twice! They gave me opportunities, guidance, resources, experience and a lot more! 1000/10 recommended community for Web3! ğŸ’¯
